column3:
“This was my first time trying any kind of cannabis in over 10 years. 

I only experimented occasionally in my youth, for a year or two when I first when to college. My experiences were very mixed, but for the most part, I didn't like it. 

I decided to start researching cannabis use again as I've developed terrible insomnia which is brought on by anxiety attacks at night. Also, I do enjoy having a drink, but I'd like...”

“Sweet strain. I have been researching cbd for a while thinking it may hold the answer to my treatment resistant depression and anxiety. 10 years of mental illness and pain is long enough. I finally got access to cbd nordle from cbd crew. tested at 8% cbd, 16% thc. It has noticeably reduced my chronic stomach pain, anxiety, and depression. Has worked 5x better than any psych meds I have tried (i've tried about 20) and...”

“Great medical strain. Sweet, sugary smell. Doesn't produce a strong cough. High CBD and modest/low THC levels, making it a poor choice for recreational users but a perfect choice for many medical users. The effects of this plant are amazing. It creates such a mild high that it is almost unnoticeable. What is noticeable is how wonderful you will feel. The effects on anxiety/PTSD is simply amazing. The high CBD/THC rat...”

“Got this strain as Argyle from Tweed as a Canadian Medical Marijuana patient. I would say that this is a great strain for starters and equally for those experienced. Experienced medical users often have a nice cheap form of medicine with high amounts of CBD, this is what stashes that section for me.

Taking this up on its own, or mixed to support another strain, you can't go wrong with this stuff. Anything with high ...”

“The most amazing strain for migraines/pain EVER! I haven't been able to find it since I got a little not knowing what I had. The day after I bought it I woke up with the worst altitude/tension/sinus migraine I've had in a long time...I thought we were stuck, there was no way I could drive; I could barely open my eyes. So I gave it a shot: 2 tokes and 2 minutes later it was gone! No pharmaceutical has ever been so fas...”
“Great strain!  Only downside or positive side is the CBD is just as high as the THC with this strain.  It's more of a body stone, bringing pain relief for me and my MS.”

“If you're looking for a smooth Indica that's going to mellow you out, relax you, and end up putting you into a good night's sleep, this is for you. 

By far, my favorite CDB strain. I was reluctant to try it at first, as I was enjoying the Canna-Tsu strain, and went to pick up a bit more, only to find out they were out. 

Intrigued that this was an Indica, I decided to give it a go. Awesome. 

I vaporize this at nigh...”

“very good high cbd strain, probably one of my favorite cbd cannabis strains. nice mellow body feel, and very nice slight head high, nice relaxation, or for pain inflammation. tastes a little like Afghan but with that distinctive cbd cannabis taste, but overall pretty good tasting. would smoke again. tested at 10%/10% ratio from urban wellness in Albuquerque”

“This strain was recommended by a budtender at Ganja Goddess for an evening / de-stress vibe, and she totally nailed it. (For context, I am a *very* light use / occasional smoker that seeks out high CBD strains for relaxation + anxiety reduction with low psychoactive effects,)

Onset was a little bit heady, but eased quickly + gently into a really killer state of mental and physical relaxation. Took away the stress of...”
“As a beginner" again
column4: not having regularly smoked in 19 years
column5: this is the best!!  I've been trying a lot of strains over the past 4 months and keeping a journal. I need relief from endometriosis
column8: and migraines.  I am a mom of 3 so my days are very busy so I need to be clear - headed and sharp. I did not feel high after smoking this
column9: I just feel better!  My mind is focused

column3: “Probably one of the best tasting CBD strains! It also has a nice relaxing high that isn't to intense. Definitely up there with the CBD strains I have tried.”

“Smooth and calming, high in CBD.  This stuff smells like turkish delight (walnuts and sugar and fruit) and gives a light, pleasant stone.  Its pretty easy on the mind; I thought it was weak at first but the CBD effect is fabulous.”
“This strain is found as Argyle" from Tweed (Canadian grower).  Low in both THC and CBD
column4: this is helpful as a daytime remedy for my anxiety.  Other strains with low THC sometimes have a higher CBD content which leaves me feeling irritable.  Vaping is my delivery method of choice. The initial "high" wears off after about an hour and I can focus to get things done.”"

column3: “I bought this strain from the SQDC from Soleil. I really wanted to like this strain because of the the high CBD (about 13%) compared to THC (7%) but I got anxious (self defeating thoughts and self judgement). I tried to mix it with another high CBD strain (Cannatonic), I tried smoking less.. Hélas! I can only feel fine if I smoke an extremely low amount with another strain... But, I have BPD, so I smoke to mellow out...”
“great for severe rheumatoid arthritis .. gets rid of the pain and doesnt mess your day up”

“The one I tried was THC 7.3 and CBD 11.9. 
A great CBD option (Medicinal) with a touch of Indica.”

“I bought this strain from the SQDC from Soleil. I really wanted to like this strain because of the the high CBD (about 13%) compared to THC (7%) but I got anxious (self defeating thoughts and self judgement). I tried to mix it with another high CBD strain (Cannatonic), I tried smoking less.. Hélas! I can only feel fine if I smoke an extremely low amount with another strain... But, I have BPD, so I smoke to mellow out...”

“Lovely bliss - not overly high. Good for pain management as well as mood and concentration. It's my go to strain when I have things to do and need some motivation when I feel my body and mind are not cooperating.”
“Great for night time tremors in extremity's.”

“I love this strain, especially when I need to relax or am having some pain. It's pretty mild and it's extremely calming which I love because I tend to get a lot of anxiety, so I try to avoid strains that might not help with that. I'm always extremely comfortable using this strain though, it really puts me at ease and is such a calming high.”

“This strain has the same qualities as its name. No idea what it does well or bad. It should just be called boring.

Save your money.”
“This worked GREAT to ease my inflammation and pain”
“Great strain for minor aches and pain.  Also, great if you want a good night's sleep. Really nice relaxing strain!”

“I see here that people are talking about CBD Nordle from CBD Crew, so I will review that. Just Nordle, as it says on the header, is a pure THC strain from Mr.nice, witch is one of the parents in the CBD Nordle. 

I love the CBD Nordle ( and the normal one to! )  great to grow easy and fast flowering.  Nice indica effect with the calming CBD, I all around love it.  For a sativa lover, maybe a bit more stoned" than  t...”"

“This strain has the same qualities as its name. No idea what it does well or bad. It should just be called boring.

Save your money.”

“Very nice strain. High simular to drinking a little too much whiskey but without the hangover. Slightly dizzy a few times but overall very relaxing. If you're on a diet beware because this will give you the munchies bad!”
“All that CBD loosened up the joints, had me feelin' real nice and limber. :)”
“Sweet and Citrus.”
“Really low key but really good vibe. Throw some headphones on and your favorite album and enjoy the journey.”
“This strain was a very good medicinal strain. It combats the effects of pain, and anxiety with minimal euphoria and dizziness. It did make me a little sleepy, but overall it was good.”
“Purchased as Solei - Balance" in Canada. Mild
column4: clear head high that gave me energy and focus while baking and doing dishes.”"

column3:
“Don’t buy this if you’re looking to get high. 
Whenever I’m stressed about school or work or anything, this calms me, keeps me on task and motivates me to do what I need to do. You don’t feel a true high from this, but medically perfect strain. Mixing with alcohol is a ticket for a happy party without the loopy or dizzy feeling,”
“Bought it under the name Balance" by Solei.  Very relaxing
column4: doesn't really get you "high" like other strains might
column5: really feels like the "beer" version of weed.  I got a little bit anxious the first time I had it but it only lasted for a little
column6: and it was really mild.  Perfect strain for someone who's looking to try cannabis for the first time.”"

column3: “If you're like me, you get extra anxious with higher THC levels, then this is a good starting place. Nordle, purchased through Tweed as Argyle
column4: is a balanced 1:1 THC/CBD. This current strain is 4.03%/4.22% and leaves me feeling a slight head buzz. I am able to concentrate on work, converse with clients, and complete my day to day tasks without feeling super high. Also, this is a solid strain to smoke 5-10 mins befo...”

column3: “I have a love hate relationship with this strain. When I'm with buds, it's fantastic. Gives me just the right amount of energy and allows me to relax and enjoy the time with my friends. Definitely recommended for that scenario. The downside is when I smoke it alone. It's like an itch on the back of my brain and aggravates my anxiety more than I would like. Bottom of the line is its good for a long night with friends,...”
“good strain!!  does great on my back pain.”

“A pretty solid strain for a balanced strain. I've purchased it under the Solei Balance brand and typically find this one to come in a 2:1 ratio of CBD:THC.

Flavour: Through vaping, I find the overall flavour profile to evolve down a nice path, generally starting with a little earthy citrus. As I got further into my session, I found the flavour to evolve more into a fall leaves character before settling into a more t...”
“Balanced”
“Definitely good for that night time buzz.. relaxes all your muscles to the point you get a great nights sleep.”
“Great pain killer CBDCrew seeds are simply awesome!  The flavour is sweet and savoury. You will feel wakefulness and a rubbery body feeling.”

“- sedating 
- calming
- lovely”

“Super fruity sweet smelling strain. It tastes just like it smells when smoked. 
It's a body high mixed with the high CBD content. Perfect for a rainy lazy day or when you're trying to relax late night after work.”

“***Bilingual English/French***  Out of this world munchies. Nordle will make you empty the fridge (period)
makes me very dizzy 
head buzz with some body heavyness. I am not fonctional on Nordle high. good to relax and sleep

Un gouffre sans fond, Nordle vous fera vider le frigidaire point a la ligne. 
Je suis très étourdi sous l'effet de Nordle, mais sans mal de cœur ou nausée. Effet de tête légère et certain membre ...”

“This takes me back to sick days as a kid without the bother of a scratchy throat and hand sanitizer. Subtle beginning with a strong finish. 

A favorite review of mine pointed out it tastes of Turkish Delight, and I couldn't agree more! 

Pop on some Netflix and treat yo' self.”
“Very mild head high but definitely relaxing. Made going to sleep just that much easier.”

“very tasty as relaxing great for going to bed or just relaxing to your self its great for just chilling without being over stoned perfect if you ask me to get a clear head for the next day. CBD's to me are a reset or make me worse since it removes too much but this is great balance of stoner with a light euphoric sensation. 8/10”
“good for anxiety and pain”
“Very nice body feel, definite stoning effect and relaxation.”
“great for anxiety”
“excellent medication for nassau and nerve pain”
“This bud is very sweet and has one of the best tastes from what I've experienced. I recommend this before PS4 kinda night. Very chill vibes over here.”

“Note to self: don't watch Matthew Santoro on Nordle, he will make you think some crazy shit with his 10 psychic future events show that is scary as hell. No, go watch a countdown of marvel Easter eggs or something woman. (<-- I'm woman). 

Seriously, this strain is great for sleep, it gives me a relaxed feeling all over and makes me calm, but apparently also paranoid.”

“I enjoy this star in very much. I use it upon waking generally I vape it. I find it has a very low smell and taste great. Its very calming but also allows me to stay active and feel energized. It helps me best with anxiety and stress. Also has a secondary effect on pain.
I give it a 4 because it busts up very fluffy and I prefer to smoke and vape more a substantial looking grind because usually it won't go out as oft...”

“One of the most tastiest strains I've come across. Very fruity, almost pineapple, mango taste. Great flavor on the exhale which I really like .. Felt the relief kick in almost instantaneous ..a bit dry upon breaking up but otherwise nice buds.. Melt away the day with this choice”

“This strain was gifted to me to try. It smells of sweet soy sauce and the high effect is pleasant but not couch lock or sleepy. Great for before bed for muscle fatigue or a lazy afternoon. I will probably look to grow this strain.”
“Tasty strain with a very relaxed feel too it. Definitely better to use at night as it makes you a bit tired.”
“need to try”
“Nice light head buzz while reducing pain. Can fully function in all settings.”
“not bad but it doesn't make you so focused like reviews say”
“very smooth flavor and high. Thought it would be stronger,does not get you to high.”
“Gives my husband munchies.”
